statusLine.command: input=$(cat); dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); dir_name=$(basename "$dir"); git_info=""; if [ -d "$dir/.git" ]; then cd "$dir" 2>/dev/null && branch=$(git --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$branch" ] && { [ -n "$(git --no-optional-locks status --porcelain 2>/dev/null)" ] && git_info=" [$branch*]" || git_info=" [$branch]"; }; fi; context_info=""; usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); context_info=" | ${pct}%"; fi; echo "${dir_name}${git_info} | ${model}${context_info}"
